value: Student Undertaking Form for Campus Recruitments
student of B.Tech _____________________________________, hereby declare that I shall abide by the
following rules and instructions during all campus placement  activities organized by the Placement Cell
1. I shall attend placement drives only when I meet the eligibility criteria specified by the company and
2. I  shall participate  in  all  the  processes  of  the  placement  drive  in  the  department  or  in  the  hostel  as
3. I  shall wear proper University  attire and  abide  by  all  institutional rules  during  placement-related
